table.name: vtiger_serviceassignset
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_serviceassignset` ( `serviceassignsetid` int(11) NOT NULL, `serviceid` varchar(20) default NULL, `accountcount` int(19) DEFAULT '0', `creatorid` int(19) DEFAULT '200', `createdtime` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `modifiedby` int(19) DEFAULT '0', `modifiedtime` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `remark` text, PRIMARY KEY (`serviceassignsetid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
